org.apache.flink.api.common.functions

接口 GroupReduceFunction<T,O>

  • 类型参数:
    T - Type of the elements that this function processes.
    O - The type of the elements returned by the user-defined function.
    所有超级接口:
    Function, java.io.Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    AdamicAdar.ComputeScores, AdamicAdar.GenerateGroupPairs, AdamicAdar.GenerateGroupSpans, AggregateOperator.AggregatingUdf, CombineToGroupCombineWrapper, EdgeMetrics.ReduceEdgeStats, EnumTriangles.TriadBuilder, FirstReducer, Graph.ApplyGroupReduceFunction, Graph.ApplyNeighborGroupReduceFunction, GroupReduceIterator, HadoopReduceCombineFunction, HadoopReduceFunction, IdentityGroupReduce, JaccardIndex.ComputeScores, JaccardIndex.GenerateGroupPairs, JaccardIndex.GenerateGroupSpans, MusicProfiles.CreateSimilarUserEdges, PageRank.BuildOutgoingEdgeList, PlanUnwrappingReduceGroupOperator.TupleUnwrappingGroupCombinableGroupReducer, PlanUnwrappingReduceGroupOperator.TupleUnwrappingNonCombinableGroupReducer, PlanUnwrappingSortedReduceGroupOperator.TupleUnwrappingGroupCombinableGroupReducer, PlanUnwrappingSortedReduceGroupOperator.TupleUnwrappingNonCombinableGroupReducer, RichCombineToGroupCombineWrapper, RichGroupReduceFunction, SampleInCoordinator, ScalaAggregateOperator.AggregatingUdf, Summarization.EdgeGroupReducer, Summarization.VertexGroupReducer, TriangleEnumerator.DegreeCounter, TriangleEnumerator.TriadBuilder, TriangleListing.GenerateTriplets, TriangleListing.GenerateTriplets, TriangleListing.ReduceBitmask, VertexCentricIteration.MessageCombinerUdf, VertexDegrees.DegreeCount, VertexDegrees.ReduceBitmask

    @Public
public interface GroupReduceFunction<T,O>
extends Function, java.io.Serializable
    The interface for group reduce functions. GroupReduceFunctions process groups of elements. They may aggregate them to a single value, or produce multiple result values for each group. The group may be defined by sharing a common grouping key, or the group may simply be all elements of a data set.

    For a reduce functions that works incrementally by combining always two elements, see ReduceFunction.

    The basic syntax for using a grouped GroupReduceFunction is as follows: 

    
 DataSet<X> input = ...;
 
 DataSet<X> result = input.groupBy(<key-definition>).reduceGroup(new MyGroupReduceFunction());
    Partial computation can significantly improve the performance of a GroupReduceFunction. This technique is also known as applying a Combiner. Implement the GroupCombineFunction interface to enable partial computations, i.e., a combiner for this GroupReduceFunction.

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法

    • 方法详细资料

      • reduce

        void reduce(java.lang.Iterable<T> values,
            Collector<O> out)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        The reduce method. The function receives one call per group of elements.
        参数:
        values - All records that belong to the given input key.
        out - The collector to hand results to.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - This method may throw exceptions. Throwing an exception will cause the operation to fail and may trigger recovery.
